title: Juliet - Novel Updates
author: White Sword   흰도요
description:
Why’d Shakespeare have to name the main character in the play Juliet? Life would’ve been so much smoother if the title of that damn tragedy was Romeo and Britney!

Juliet Holiday, a high school student in Kansas, was a bit annoyed by her unusual name, but her day was going as it usually does…

“Hi, nice to meet you. I am Romeo.”

Until he transferred in.

From the fatefully-named Romeo Buchannon, to football team quarterback Grey Holt, to childhood friend Luke Theobold…

Juliet’s constantly changing relationships are changing her school life in a not so constant way.>
